english.verse1: Lord of all creation. Of the water, earth and sky. The Heavens are Your Tabernacle. Glory to the Lord on high.
english.verse2: Early in the morning. I will celebrate the light. And when I stumble into darkness. I will call Your name by night.
english.ending: Hallelujah to the Lord of Heaven and earth.
english.chorus: God of wonders, beyond our galaxy. You are holy, holy. The universe declares Your majesty. You are holy, holy. Lord of Heaven and Earth. Lord of Heaven and Earth.

chord.verse1: Esus F#m D2 Esus F#m D2 Esus F#m D2 Esus F#m D2
chord.verse2: Esus F#m D2 Esus F#m D2 Esus F#m D2 Esus F#m D2
chord.chorus: A E Bm7 D2 A E Bm7 D2 D2
